pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prediction Limits for Poisson Distribution // Prediction limits for the Poisson distribution are produced from both frequentist and Bayesian viewpoints. Limiting results are provided in a Bayesian setting with uniform, Jeffreys and gamma as prior distributions. More details on the methodology are discussed in Bejleri and Nandram (2018) doi:10.1080/03610926.2017.1373814.
